items.value: one of Capone's Dealer is sick!

Did you sell the Stuff?
I need € 300 of the Income, you can keep € 200.
And unfortunately my Dealer is still sick, I need you again!

Capone wants:
€ 300

You will receive for your next Job:
20x Baggie (Ganja)
New Job? Tell me more first..
Yes i have the € 300 for you and 1x free Inv. Slot!
Uh.. your Money.. will be back!

Yes, it's about selling more Baggies.
Attend another Concert to get rid of them!
I will of course reward you for that.

Your Reputation with the Gang also increases!
sounds good, where did we stop?
Err.. i will come back later!

you are really a great Guy!
I look forward to doing a lot of Business with you.

You get:
20x Baggie (ganja)
Sell the Baggies and come back to me with the € 1.000

Where's the € 300, my Share?
Did you spend all the Money?!?!

Come back with the Money otherwise it will have consequences!
